error.signature: TS1240: Unable to resolve signature of class decorator when called as an expression. Experimental support for decorators requires 'experimentalDecorators'.

verdict.summary: Decorators require either experimentalDecorators (legacy) or the new TC39 decorators (TS 5.0+). Check tsconfig.json settings.

dead_ends.action: Enable both experimentalDecorators and the new TC39 decorators simultaneously
dead_ends.why_fails: The two decorator systems are incompatible; enabling both causes conflicting behavior

workarounds.action: Enable experimentalDecorators and emitDecoratorMetadata in tsconfig.json

leads_to.condition: After enabling decorators, metadata types may conflict

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Module augmentation is about extending types; decorator errors are about decorator syntax and metadata support
